identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a military-grade, tactical strategic intelligence platform that breaks the 'AI slop' aesthetic.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Palantir utility with Matrix aesthetics.
Content is King: Data is the hero, not the container.
Zoom In: High density, focus on details.
Negative Space: Use it to group functional areas, not just for air.
Contrast: High contrast for readability (White on Black).

context.goal: Information clarity, functional beauty, high density.
context.aesthetic: Mission Impossible / Matrix / Palantir / Bloomberg Terminal

usage.headings: Uppercase, tracking-wide, font-bold. Use for section titles.
usage.body: High legibility, technical feel. Use for descriptions.
usage.mono: Use for ALL numbers, metrics, IDs, timestamps, and status codes.

rules: Use Cyan (#00F0FF) for primary actions and active states.
Use Red (#FF3B30) strictly for alerts and critical errors.
Use Green (#00FF41) for success and stable states.
Backgrounds must be deep black/grey, never pure white.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-filter: blur(20px); background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
decorations: Grid lines (CSS background pattern) for empty space.

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-500/10 text-cyan-400 border border-cyan-500/50 hover:bg-cyan-500/20 hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,240,255,0.3)] uppercase tracking-widest font-mono text-xs py-2 px-4 clip-path-polygon
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 text-white/70 border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 uppercase tracking-widest font-mono text-xs py-2 px-4
buttons.destructive: bg-red-500/10 text-red-500 border border-red-500/50 hover:bg-red-500/20 uppercase tracking-widest font-mono text-xs py-2 px-4

cards.base: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.base: bg-black/50 border-b border-white/20 focus:border-cyan-500 text-white font-mono placeholder:text-white/20 rounded-none px-0 py-2 transition-colors

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 1px. Sharp, technical look.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. PURGE PURPLE: Search for '#BD00FF', 'purple', 'violet', 'fuchsia' in all CSS/Tailwind config and REPLACE with transparent, slate, or cyan variants. NO PURPLE ALLOWED.
2. UPDATE FONTS: Install/Import 'IBM Plex Sans' and replace 'Inter'. Ensure 'JetBrains Mono' is used for all data points.
3. FLATTEN UI: Remove rounded corners (use rounded-none or rounded-sm). Add 1px borders to everything.
4. INCREASE DENSITY: Reduce padding in cards, increase information density. Use grid layouts effectively.
5. ADD DECORATIONS: Implement 'corner brackets' (absolute positioned divs) on cards to give that HUD look.
6. UPDATE COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Crystal Glass' and 'Terminal' aesthetic.
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic gradients, centered layouts).
Use 2-3x more spacing in containers, but tight spacing in data grids.
